awd_titl_txt: US-China Cooperative Research:  Permian Ammonoid Biofacies  and Biostratigraphy of China and North America
awd_abstract_narration: This award supports cooperative research between Brian Glenister,               University of Iowa, and Zhou Zuren, Nanjing Institute of Geology and            Paleontology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, on the Permian period, a             time of profound physical and biotic change.  Biostratigraphy is a              fundamental base for much of the basic and applied work in geology,             and this proposal promises to contribute to establishing a Permian              global stratotype.  Through ongoing investigation of the Permian                systems and its ammonoids, valuable collections available in China              and the US can be documented and correlated  under this collaboration.
org_div_long_name: Office of International Science and Engineering

pgm_ele.pgm_ele_name: US CHINA COOP IN BASIC SCIENCE
